message.entry: HDL support requires the trellis to be defined by the function poly2trellis in the block mask
HDL support requires encoding rates from 1/2 to 1/7, or 2/3
HDL support requires a constraint length from 3 to 9
HDL support is not available for the Truncated trellis operation mode
HDL support is not available for the Terminated trellis operation mode
HDL support requires the reset signal to be boolean
HDL support requires that the Delay reset action to next time step checkbox be selected. This will lead to a synchronous soft reset in the HDL code.
HDL support requires boolean or ufix1 data input
